segments.text: I'm feeling a growing sense of unease looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are so many potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious risk is that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted at such an angle, I'm sure it will collapse backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and injure himself badly, perhaps even break dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the pooling water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a significant slip hazard for anyone moving through the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is already in it, and she could easily lose her footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And imagine the water damage to those nice cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to strike at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation just fills me with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems so delicate, on the verge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
